cab.content: S E C R E T-,WESTERN FRONT.There is no change in the general situation,,2* ITALIAN FBONTc.Further progress has boon made across the PIAVE andthe Allied troops have now gained VA2Z0LA and ScLUCIA DIPIAvE, The total number of prisoners captured since thenight 23rd/24th October- is nearly 13,000,30 ' BAX/KAN FRONT oIn ALBANIA the Italians have crossed the MATI andentered ALESSIO,41 Palestine front^There is nothing to reportcGeneral Staff,,War Office, S5WJ,,29th October, 1918.Issued at 12,30 Pc,m0
